title: Cosmic Garden

style_attributes.composition: Organic flowing forms with cosmic elements in a dreamlike garden setting
style_attributes.texture: Smooth with ethereal glow effects and particle details
style_attributes.technique: Digital painting with particle effects and light manipulation

prompt_used: A cosmic garden with vibrant colors, flowing organic forms, and ethereal light effects, blending surreal and abstract elements
description: This artwork depicts an otherworldly garden with cosmic elements, featuring vibrant colors and flowing organic forms. It blends surrealism with abstract art to create a mystical, dreamlike environment that evokes a sense of wonder and exploration.
inspiration_value: The vibrant color relationships and the balance between organic and cosmic elements make this a valuable reference for projects exploring surreal environments and dreamlike spaces.
